name: "KOEi" Volcano Bowl, Mugs (4) and Print Entertaining Set
description:
This MASSIVE Volcano Bowl has a 108 ounce capacity and features FOUR matching companion MUGS that hold 6 oz. each.  
 
If that isn't enough, this set comes complete with an included 18" x 18"  Serigraph Print  that is Signed & Numbered by SHAG too!

MADE in USA
 
All this comes complete in one carefully packaged box with the Bowl, Mugs and Print (flat inside two pieces of cardboard) inside.  
 
We know you'll love this set and will enjoy entertaining from it for years to come (or until you all pass out!). Display this set proudly and make it a key part of your Tiki collection.

name: "A to Z" Hardcover book by SHAG
description:
Hardcover book by SHAG depicting images of the 26 original paintings he did in the early 2000's depicting each letter of the Alphabet.

Note: Each letter from the series (a through z) has either been produced (or will eventually be produced) as a limited edition serigraph (in an edition size of 250 pieces).  Some of these may be available here in this store.

name: "Tree Show" Book by Mark Ryden (Hardcover)
description:
Book Size: 12" x 9"
Pages: 128
Edition Size: 10,000

A showcase of pieces from Mark Ryden's 2007 major solo exhibition at the Michael Kohn Gallery in Los Angeles, the Tree Show Book features over 130 color images including Mark's paintings, drawings, studies, and sculptural works. This 128-page hard bound full-color edition also includes a wealth of Mark's inspirational reference materials as well as an essay by Holly Meyers and artist's statement.

name: "The Official ROSE Pendant"
description:
Pendant Size: 1-3/8” x 1-13/16”

REGULAR PRICE: $99

Description 
	
This large enameled metal pendant features Mark Ryden's “Rose” painting from his 2003 “Blood Show.” The back is custom-stamped with Mark’s logo. The pendant comes with a high quality black leather cord and a brass clasp, and is packaged in a specially made box with a certificate of authenticity.

name: The Snow Yak Show Print Portfolio (Spectaculum Poefagorum Nivium) by Mark Ryden
description:
By Mark Ryden
Portfolio Size: 15-1/8" x 11-7/8" x 1-1/2"
Print Size: 13-7/8" x 10-7/8"
Edition Size: 50

Description 		
	 
This very special portfolio of museum-quality, digital pigment ink prints features all eight paintings and two drawings from Mark Ryden's 2009 solo exhibition at the Tomio Koyama Gallery in Tokyo, Japan. The 10 images have been meticulously printed on the finest archival print paper, placed inside individual Kozo paper folders and presented in a finely handmade clam shell box. Each 13-7/8" x 10-7/8" print is numbered and hand-signed by the artist. Each portfolio comes with a full-color, embossed, signed and numbered title print and a letterpressed colophon.

name: "The Snow Yak Show Exhibition Book" by Mark Ryden (Hardcover)
description:
By Mark Ryden
Book Size: 11-1/4" x 14-3/4"
Pages: 64

Description 		
	 
A showcase of pieces from Mark Ryden's 2009 solo exhibition at the Tomio Koyama Gallery in Tokyo, The Snow Yak Show Exhibition Book features many color images including Mark's paintings, and drawings.

This 64-page hard bound full-color edition also includes a collection of personal photographs from the show. Click the "detail views" button above to see all 68 pages.
